Module technology.sola.engine
Package technology.sola.engine.graphics.gui.json.styles

Interface StylesJsonValueParser<Builder extends BaseStyles.Builder<?>>

Type Parameters:
Builder - the builder type extending BaseStyles
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseStylesJsonValueParser, TextInputStylesJsonValueParser, TextStylesJsonValueParser
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface StylesJsonValueParser<Builder extends BaseStyles.Builder<?>>
StylesJsonValueParser handles parsing a style value from a JsonElement and setting it into a StylesBuilder.
